original: 5.1.154.3 āyātu bhagavān puruṣas sa-gaṇas sa-sainyas sa-śrī-sahāyas saha-devatābhir anumanyatām

analyzed: āyātu bhagavatī hariṇī śyāma varṇā sa gaṇā sa sainyā śrī paramapuruṣa sahāyā saha devatābhiḥ anumanyatām

original: 5.1.155.10 yā nīlotpalāsanā nīlotpala-hastā mahā-cātaka-vāhinī nityam ṛṣibhiś cānugāminī tām ajāṃ nīlotpala-netrīṃ bhagavatīṃ lam[*252]

original: [*695] US viyati kṣayāṇāṃ replaces vipad akṣayāṇām
analyzed: us viyanti kṣayāṇām replaces vipad akṣayāṇām

7.1.19.4 [10.4] tamas sarva-bhūtam adhunod vareṇyas[*715] tvaṃ[*716] satva-rūpaṃ[*717] sakalaṃ[*718] prakāśya[*719]

analyzed: u sahasoḥ dharitrī replaces sahasūḥ dharitre

original: yasyo dāvodan-artham[*732] uccam uccair urugāyā svāhā

original: 7.1.20.5 [10.10][*736] yo vā 'vyaktaṃ sakalaṃ pravṛddhyā yad idaṃ sarvam āsīt

sa ānandam sa akṛtam haran parāya svāhā

original: yasyecchā loke vā prajāyatir loke yasmai vāsi tasmai /

original: 7.1.21.1 [11.1][*737] yo vā bhūter bhūtir āsīt sā vānandaṃ pratyānandam
analyzed: yaḥ vā bhūteḥ bhūtiḥ āsīt sā vā ānandam pratyānandam

analyzed: ṛtam satyam amitam purāṇam ādim janitram amṛtam sura indram

analyzed: rayimat su puṣṭim guṇavantam atra tasmai su puṇyāya vara dāya pitre svāhā

analyzed: sandhārayantīm svayam a pramattām saṃyojayitre vara dāya pitre svāhā

original: paro lokānām ajito jitātman bhavate 'bhavāya svāhā
analyzed: paras lokānām ajitaḥ jita ātman bhavate bhavāya svāhā

analyzed: su sūkṣmaḥ sarveṣām tasthuḥ tasthuṣām jaṃgamaḥ jaṃgamānām

original: 7.2.1.3 [1.3] jyotir vā pāramātmikaṃ sārvaṃ viśva-bhavaṃ bhavāya prabhūtaṃ prāhiṇvan[*741] paramparāya su-kṛtaṃ kṛtāya tasmai varāya īśiṣe

original: kakudaṃ kakuc chitvā bhūyaḥ parāya svāhā
analyzed: kakudam kakud śitvā bhūyas parāya svāhā

analyzed: yaḥ vā gaviṣṭhaḥ paramaḥ pradhānaḥ padam vā yasya satvam āsīt

analyzed: tvam buddhiḥ bhūtānām antarātmā puṇyavatām puṇyeṣu sajjamānaḥ tvam buddhyā vicinvamānaḥ puṇya rūpāya svāhā

original: 7.2.6.1 [3.6] yo brahmā brahma-vidām ātmā syād ātma-cakṣuṣām

original: 7.2.6.2 [3.7] sārasvato vā eṣa devo 'yaṃ na vā hayaḥ pāramātmikaḥ

original: 7.2.6.3 [3.8] yo vā paraṃ jyotiḥ paraṃ sandadhānaḥ

original: 7.2.6.4 [3.9] yo doṣaś caturaś caturthaś caturaḥ padārthān

original: sarvaṃ lokasya sandadhānas sate satvam ādadhānāya svāhā

original: ādadhānaḥ yaṃ brahma brahma-guptaye paraṃparāya svāhā
analyzed: ādadhānaḥ yam brahma brahmaguptaye paraṃparāya svāhā

original: 7.2.7.1 [4.1] vāko vā anuvāko vākaṃ vākaṃ saṃjuṣamāṇaḥ

original: devas sa svaṃ sva-guptaye svayaṃ jyotiṣe jyotiṣe svāhā
analyzed: devaḥ sa svam sva guptaye svayam jyotiṣe jyotiṣe svāhā

original: 7.2.7.2 [4.2] dvāv etau pakṣī acaraṃ carantau nādhuraṃ vyadhunīte

yaḥ ca ekaḥ bhunakti bhoktre svāhā

original: 7.2.7.3 [4.3] yo vā āyuḥ paramātmānaṃ[*746] mīḍhuṣaḥ pāraṃparyāt paraḥ parāyaṇaḥ paro lokānāṃ paramā dadhānaḥ parataḥ parāya svāhā
analyzed: yaḥ vai āyuḥ mīḍhuṣaḥ pāraṃparyāt paraḥ parāyaṇaḥ paraḥ lokānām paramā dadhānaḥ paratas parāya svāhā

original: 7.2.7.4 [4.4] yo vā tejas tejasāṃ tejas teja ādadhānaḥ

original: satyas tejas tejasāṃ tejas tejas tejase svāhā

original: 7.2.8.1 [4.6] yo vā saṃyogas saṃjuṣamāṇas sandhus sandhukṣaṇānām

original: saṃyogaṃ sandadhānaḥ puṇyaḥ puṇyānāṃ puṇyāya svāhā

original: 7.2.8.2 [4.7] sahasraṃ vā yasyaiva vitānam ādadhānas sahasraṃ vā

analyzed: āsiṣaḥ sāsikāḥ sahasram yasya vai sāsikāḥ sahasram sahasrāya svāhā

original: 7.2.8.3 [4.8] svātigā guptayo guptis satyaṃ satyānāṃ sātvaṃ padam
analyzed: sva atigāḥ guptayaḥ guptiḥ satyam satyānām sātvam padam

original: tat satvaṃ satvam āsīt sātvaṃ sātvaṃ vai sātvam ādadhānāya svāhā
analyzed: tat satvam satvam āsīt sātvam sātvam vai sātvam ādadhānāya svāhā

original: 7.2.8.4 [4.9] satvaṃ vā udrekam āsīd yat satvam ubhayor anugoptā

original: 7.2.8.5 [4.10] satyo jyotis satyāntarātmā satyodyogas satyas sat-karma

original: 7.2.9.1 [5.1] satyas satvaṃ puṇyam āsīt puṇyo vā daivikam satyaṃ
analyzed: satyaḥ satvam puṇyam āsīt puṇyaḥ vā daivikam satyam

original: satvam ārṣaṃ satyaṃ satvaṃ sat-pathāya svāhā
analyzed: sattvam ārṣam satyam sattvam sat pathāya svāhā

original: 7.2.9.2 [5.2] satyo jyotis satvaṃ prāṇās satvādhārās satva-saṃdhānaḥ
analyzed: satyaḥ jyotiḥ satvam prāṇāḥ sattva ādhārāḥ sattva saṃdhānaḥ

original: satyas satvaṃ prakāśaṃ jyotir jyotiṣe svāhā
analyzed: satyaḥ satvam prakāśam jyotiḥ jyotiṣe svāhā

original: 7.2.9.3 [5.3] kāmīm umām īśiṣam īśiṣa satyam īśiṣam īśiṣāṇām tat satyaṃ satya-rūpaṃ
analyzed: kāmīm umām īśiṣam īśiṣa satyam īśiṣam īśiṣāṇām tat satyam satya rūpam

original: 7.2.9.5 [5.5] tat satvo vā viṣṇur udyogas sūryo go vā viṣṇur viśat
analyzed: tat satvaḥ vā viṣṇuḥ udyogaḥ sūryaḥ goḥ vā viṣṇuḥ viśat

original: viśvaṃ viśvaṃ sandadhānas tad viśvaṃ viṣṇave viśva-rūpāya svāhā
analyzed: viśvam viśvam sandadhānaḥ tat viśvam viṣṇave viśvarūpāya svāhā

original: 7.2.10.1 [5.6] tad bhūr bhū-sthaṃ bhū-stho vā viśva-rūpas tad bhūḥ prāṇa-saṃkhyātaḥ
analyzed: tat bhūḥ bhū stham bhū sthaḥ vā viśva rūpaḥ tat bhūḥ prāṇa saṃkhyātaḥ

original: bhūr bhūr āsīd bhūr asi bhuvo 'si suvar asi bhūr bhūtaye svāhā
analyzed: bhūḥ bhūḥ āsīt bhūḥ asi bhuvaḥ u si suvar asi bhūḥ bhūtaye svāhā

original: 7.2.10.2 [5.7] āpo vā āpa āpo 'ntarātmā yo vedo vedānām ādhāraḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ vai āpaḥ āpaḥ ntarātmā yaḥ vedaḥ vedānām ādhāraḥ

original: vedāntarātmā sa-raso rasa-saṃkhyāto rasaṃ rasam āsīd rasāya svāhā
analyzed: veda antarātmā sarasaḥ rasa saṃkhyātaḥ rasam rasam āsīt rasāya svāhā

original: 7.2.10.3 [5.8] trayī vā kāmaṃ trayī-mayaṃ tri-guṇaṃ tretātmakam
analyzed: trayī vā kāmam trayī mayam triguṇam tretā ātmakam

original: trayī vā jyotis tri-guṇaṃ tri-guṇātmakaṃ tasmai tretāgnaye tri-guṇāya svāhā
analyzed: trayī vā jyotiḥ triguṇam triguṇa ātmakam tasmai tretāgnaye triguṇāya svāhā

original: 7.2.10.4 [5.9] dvau vā mukhyau mukhyādhārau sa-sukhau sānandau
analyzed: dvau vā mukhyau mukhya ādhārau sa sukhau sa ānandau
sa smerau smera āyatau sa ānandam ānandate svāhā
saḥ ekaikaḥ sa ādhāraḥ sa adhiṣṭhānaḥ ina adhiṣṭhānaḥ

original: kaṃ kaṃ pade pade pātaḥ pādāya pādite svāhā
analyzed: kam kam pade pade pātaḥ pādāya pādite svāhā

original: 7.2.11.1 [6.1] svayam ādis sarvāntarātmā devas sa svayaṃ krīḍātmakam avāsṛjat
analyzed: svayam ādiḥ sarva antarātmā devaḥ sa svayam krīḍā ātmakam avāsṛjat

original: yas svayaṃ lokam avadhāram avadhārayant svāhā
analyzed: yaḥ svayam lokam avadhāram avadhārayan svāhā

original: 7.2.11.2 [6.2] yas svayaṃ sṛṣṭam ātmanā guptam anu saṃvitānam acaraṃ carantam
analyzed: yaḥ svayam sṛṣṭam ātmanā guptam anu saṃvitānam acaram carantam

original: svayaṃ krīḍan krīḍayan krīḍāntaram anuprāviśat svāhā
analyzed: svayam krīḍan krīḍayan krīḍā antaram anuprāviśat svāhā
sva ojasā sarvam ādadhāti yaḥ pāpīyāḥ

original: supuṇyaṃ puṇyātmakaṃ[*749] puṇya-vitānan dadhāra devāya svāhā
analyzed: su puṇyam puṇya vitānan dadhāra devāya svāhā

original: 7.2.11.4 [6.4] kṣmām ekāṃ salilāvasannāṃ śrutvā svanantīm anu supatantīm
analyzed: kṣmām ekām salila avasannām śrutvā svanantīm anu su patantīm

original: svayaṃ bhūtvā varāho vara ujjahāra tasmai devāya sukṛtāya pitre svāhā
analyzed: svayam bhūtvā varāhaḥ varaḥ ujjahāra tasmai devāya su kṛtāya pitre svāhā

original: 7.2.11.5 [6.5] yaḥ kundharamāṇaḥ kun-dharān kuṃ-dharatām ity avocat
analyzed: yaḥ kundharamāṇaḥ kundharān kundhara tām iti avocat

original: tāṃ sānumato vidadhat sva-tejasā tasmai variṣṭhāya varadāya pitre svāhā
analyzed: tām sānumataḥ vidadhat sva tejasā tasmai variṣṭhāya vara dāya pitre svāhā
yaḥ vā pṛthām praskhalantīm pramṛjya amṛja aṃgīm

original: ya ūrvor upadadhāt tasmai mukhyāya varadāya pitre svāhā
analyzed: yaḥ ūrvoḥ upadadhāt tasmai mukhyāya vara dāya pitre svāhā

original: 7.2.12.2 [6.7] yāṃ gām uśantīm uśanābhipūrṇām ārakta-nīlām amṛtāṃ rajantīm
analyzed: yām gām uśantīm uśanā abhipūrṇām ārakta nīlām amṛtām rajantīm

original: ālālayan[*750] lālita[*751]-kaṃkaṇāṃ tāṃ tasmai prajeśāya varadāya pitre svāhā
analyzed: tām tasmai prajā īśāya vara dāya pitre svāhā

original: 7.2.12.3 [6.8] prajā-pate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā jātāni pari tā babhūva
analyzed: prajāpate na tvat etāni anyaḥ viśvā jātāni pari tā babhūva

original: yat-kāmās te juhumas tan no astu vaya(gg)
analyzed: yad kāmāḥ te juhumaḥ tat naḥ astu vayaggh

original: 7.2.12.4 [6.9] yo dhūr dhuraṃ dhūr dhuraṃ dhūr varāṇām
analyzed: yaḥ dhūḥ dhuram dhūḥ dhuram dhūḥ varāṇām

original: sudhūr dhūr asi dhūr dhurāṇāṃ dhūr asi dhūr-vaṃga me[*752] svāhā
analyzed: su dhūḥ dhūḥ asi dhūḥ dhurāṇām dhūḥ asi dhūrvaṃga svāhā

original: 7.2.12.5 [6.10] yo vā vyahiṃṣīj jarayājarantaṃ tan daitya-mukhyam amṛtātma-rūpam
analyzed: yaḥ vā vyahiṃṣīt jarayā a jarantam tat daitya mukhyam amṛta ātma rūpam

original: sukhuraṃ khurāṇāṃ kiñcit svanantaṃ tasmai nṛsiṃhāya sureśa-pitre svāhā
analyzed: su khuram khurāṇām kiñcid svanantam tasmai nṛsiṃhāya sura īśa pitre svāhā
vara dāya pitre svāhā sura īśa pitre svāhā

original: 7.2.13.1 [7.1] tapo-nidhiṃ tapasāṃ rayindaṃ rayim āyur aṃgaṃ vyasanaugha-hiṃsram
analyzed: tapaḥ nidhim tapasām rayindam rayim āyuḥ aṃgam vyasana ogha hiṃsram

original: sāsiṣv asantaṃ savane savitre tasmai sureśāya sura-bṛnda-kartre svāhā
analyzed: sa asiṣu asantam savane savitre tasmai sura īśāya sura bṛnda kartre svāhā

original: 7.2.13.2 [7.2] yo vā nṛsiṃho vijayaṃ bibharṣi rā-rājimantaṃ rayi-daṃ kavīnām
analyzed: yaḥ vā nṛsiṃhaḥ vijayam bibharṣi rārājimantam rayi dam kavīnām

original: sa-rājimantaṃ sajayaṃ sahasraṃ tasmai suyantre suśevadhaye śevadhaye svāhā
analyzed: sa rājimantam sa jayam sahasram tasmai su yantre su śevadhaye śevadhaye svāhā

original: 7.2.13.3 [7.3] rayiḥ kakudmān vidadhad vinaṣṭaṃ[*753] rayimad vidhānam
ṃ suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu nas subhagā bodhatu tmanā[*754]
analyzed: ṃ suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu

original: sīvyatv apas sūcyāccidyamāna yā dadātu vīra(g)
analyzed: sīvyatu apaḥ sūcyā accidyamāna yā dadātu vīrag

original: 7.2.13.5 [7.5] vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam āditya-varṇaṃ tamasas tu pāre
analyzed: veda aham etam puruṣam mahāntam āditya varṇam tamasaḥ tu pāre

original: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadan yad āste svāhā
analyzed: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīraḥ nāmāni kṛtvā abhivadan yat āste svāhā

original: 7.2.14.1 [7.6] dig-doṣā yasya vidiśas sva-karṇau dyaur āsa vaktram udaran nabho vā
analyzed: digdoṣāḥ yasya vidiśaḥ sva karṇau dyauḥ āsa vaktram nabhaḥ vā

original: sāsi ṣma vā yās svayam āpa daṃtaṃ tasmai varatre varadāya kasmai svāhā
analyzed: sā asi sma vā yāḥ svayam āpa daṃtam tasmai varatre vara dāya kasmai svāhā

original: 7.2.14.2 [7.7] padmāsya-vakṣāḥ paramas supuṇyaḥ padmā janitrī paramasya vāsaḥ
analyzed: padma āsya vakṣāḥ paramaḥ su puṇyaḥ padmā janitrī paramasya vāsaḥ

original: sūkṣmaṃ sāvitraṃ svayam ādadhānas sāvitra-rūpaṃ paramaṃ supuṇya(gg)ṃ svāhā
analyzed: sūkṣmam sāvitram svayam ādadhānaḥ sāvitra rūpam paramam su puṇyaggṃ svāhā

original: 7.2.14.3 [7.8] yaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ paramāntarātmā kamrāṃga-rūpaṃ kamalaṃ dadhāra
analyzed: yaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ paramāntarātmā kamra aṅga rūpam kamalam dadhāra

original: 7.2.14.4 [7.9] rayīṇāṃ patiṃ bṛhantaṃ rā-rāga-muktaṃ guruṃ sanīkam[*755]
analyzed: rayīṇām patim bṛhantam rā rāga muktam gurum

original: taṃ rāyo rūpaṃ rayi-bhūta-bhūtaṃ rayimat-sura-mitre[*756] svāhā
analyzed: tam rāyaḥ rūpam rayi bhūta bhūtam svāhā

original: 7.2.14.5 [7.10] rāyāṃ patatre rayim ādadhātre rāyo bṛhantaṃ rayimat supuṣṭām
analyzed: rāyām patatre rayim ādadhātre rāyaḥ bṛhantam rayimat su puṣṭām

original: rā-rājimantaṃ rataye ramantaṃ taṃ biṃbavantaṃ kakudāya bhadre svāhā
analyzed: rārājimantam rataye ramantam tam biṃbavantam kakudāya bhadre svāhā

original: [*756] PUB: suratre instead of sura-mitre; US:
analyzed: pup suratre instead of suramitre us

original: 7.2.15.1 [8.1] yat sāra-bhūtaṃ sakalaṃ dharitraṃ moda-prāyeṇānubhūtam anuviddham
analyzed: yat sāra bhūtam sakalam dharitram moda prāyeṇa anubhūtam anuviddham

original: sūkṣmas sureśas sakalaṃ bibharti tasmai sureśāya sakalaṃ supuṇya(gg)ṃ svāhā
analyzed: sūkṣmaḥ sureśaḥ sakalam bibharti tasmai sureśāya sakalam su puṇyaggṃ svāhā

original: 7.2.15.2 [8.2] phalo vā eṣa lokānām ajaro mahātmā viśvaṃ yaḥ pāti vimalo 'malākhyaḥ
analyzed: phalaḥ vai eṣa lokānām ajaraḥ mahātmā viśvam yaḥ pāti vimalaḥ mala ākhyaḥ
tasmai varatre vara dasya puṣṭyai svāhā

original: 7.2.15.3 [8.3] dhūr no vahantāṃ rataye ramantāṃ puṃ-bhūtimantas samayas suṣumnā
analyzed: dhūḥ naḥ vahantām rataye ramantām puṃbhūtimantaḥ samayaḥ suṣumnā

original: sa no vitatya prahiṇotu patre svāhā
analyzed: sa naḥ vitatya prahiṇotu patre svāhā

original: 7.2.15.5 [8.5] so vā sva-rūpas samadṛk samagro vidhu-daṃ tudan yo vidadhat padaṃ vā
analyzed: saḥ vā sva rūpaḥ samadṛś samagraḥ vidhudam tudan yaḥ vidadhat padam vā

original: viyati prakāśaṃ bṛhate ruheṇa taṃ biṃbavantaṃ samadaṃ samagra(gg)ṃ svāhā
analyzed: viyati prakāśam bṛhate ruheṇa tam biṃbavantam samadam samagraggṃ svāhā

original: 7.2.16.1 [8.6] bhūr bhuvaṃ vā bhuvo vā suvo vā kiñcit svanantaṃ suṣuve samastam
analyzed: bhūḥ bhuvam vā bhuvaḥ vā suvar vā kiñcid svanantam suṣuve samastam

original: 7.2.16.2 [8.7] dākṣāyaṇyāṃ prasṛtaṃ samastaṃ samkocayitvā sakalaṃ vitānam
saṃvāsayan me sakalaṃ variṣṭaṃ tasmai prajeśāya dhuraṃ-dharāya svāhā
analyzed: saṃvāsayat me sakalam variṣṭam tasmai prajā īśāya dhuraṃdharāya svāhā

original: 7.2.16.3 [8.8] āśās samastāḥ prataran v antas tās tā vased yā kamalā samastā
analyzed: āśāḥ samastāḥ prataran u antar tāḥ tāḥ vaset yā kamalā samastā

original: sā me gṛhe vā samadatta puṣṭi(gg)ṃ svāhā
analyzed: sā me gṛhe vā samadatta puṣṭiggṃ svāhā

original: 7.2.16.4 [8.9] yo jaṃgamānāṃ sakalaṃ bibharṣi[*757] sarvaṃ viyad vā vicareta śakṣyan
analyzed: yaḥ jaṃgamānām sakalam sarvam viyat vā vicareta śakṣyan

original: tan naur jale vapuṣy anty ajasra(gg)ṃ svāhā
analyzed: tat nauḥ jale vapuṣi anti ajasraggṃ svāhā

original: 7.2.16.5 [8.10] yo vā daśānāṃ prasṛtās samastās tāṃs tān dadhānās samayāt sa-bījāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vā daśānām prasṛtāḥ samastāḥ tān tān dadhānāḥ samayāt sa bījāḥ

original: 7.2.17.1 [9.1] catvāro doṣāḥ praharanti yasya sarvasya goptre sa-rasāya dhāmne
analyzed: catvāraḥ doṣāḥ praharanti yasya sarvasya goptre sarasāya dhāmne

original: 7.2.17.2 [9.2] vakṣo vasaty asya varāṃ variṣṭhaṃ vākan dadhānā vavṛdhe samastam
analyzed: vakṣaḥ vasati asya varām variṣṭham vākan dadhānā vavṛdhe samastam

original: 7.2.17.3 [9.3] aṇor aṇīyān mahato mahīyān ātmā guhāyāṃ nihito 'sya jantoḥ
analyzed: aṇoḥ aṇīyān mahataḥ mahīyān ātmā guhāyām nihitaḥ u sya jantoḥ

original: tam akratuṃ paśyati vīta-śoko dhātuḥ prasādān mahimānam īśa(gg)ṃ svāhā
analyzed: tam akratum paśyati vīta śokaḥ dhātuḥ prasādāt mahimānam svāhā

original: 7.2.17.4 [9.4] viṣṇur variṣṭho vara-dāna-mukhyo yo viśva-ṛṣīn dhyāyan nu kurvan
viśvaṃ hīṣad[*758] vyadadhat tam atra tad viṣṇave yāḥ prabhaviṣṇave yā amitaṃ bharatre svāhā
analyzed: viśvam vyadadhat tam atra tat viṣṇave yāḥ prabhaviṣṇave yāḥ amitam bharatre svāhā

original: 7.2.17.5 [9.5] abjo juṣantaḥ pravadat patantaḥ pūṃ pūṃ[*759] puṣantaḥ punar yaḥ pravālaḥ[*760]
analyzed: abjaḥ juṣantaḥ pravadat patantaḥ pūm puṣantaḥ punar yaḥ

original: kaṃ kaṃ janitre sama-tejasan te svāhā
7.2.18.1 [9.6] mām ātma-guptāṃ vahate sma bhūtyaitāṃ rājimantāṃ sudhūr dhūrayantīm
analyzed: mām ātma guptām vahate sma bhūtyā etām rājimantām sudhūḥ dhūrayantīm

original: 7.2.18.2 [9.7] yaṃ cintayanto nigamānta-rūpaṃ yaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ paramātma-rūpam
analyzed: yam cintayantaḥ nigama anta rūpam yam viśva rūpam paramātma rūpam

original: taṃ vindamānāṃ sakalaṃ vrajantīṃ taṃ deva-mukhyaṃ surataṃ bhavāya svāhā
analyzed: tam vindamānām sakalam vrajantīm tam deva mukhyam suratam bhavāya svāhā

original: 7.2.18.3 [9.8] puṇyāṃ ca puṇyaḥ puruṣe pur-agre tāṃ rājimantāṃ niśi coditānām
analyzed: puṇyām ca puṇyaḥ puruṣe pur agre tām rājimantām niśi coditānām

original: 7.2.18.4 [9.9] so no bhūto yo vāmṛtātmā supuṣṭim asmat pitaraṃ pavitram
analyzed: saḥ naḥ bhūtaḥ yaḥ vā amṛta ātmā su puṣṭim asmat pitaram pavitram
saḥ naḥ stu bhūtyai kamala avarāya svāhā

original: 7.2.18.5 [9.10] sa tv eva nityaṃ sakalās sa-mūrtayas sa-ratās tv anantāḥ
analyzed: sa tu eva nityam sakalāḥ sa mūrtayaḥ saratāḥ tu anantāḥ

original: te jījayanto viyati kṣayāṇāṃ tat-tat-śavitre harate harāya svāhā
analyzed: te jījayantaḥ viyati kṣayāṇām tat tat śavitre harate harāya svāhā

original: 7.2.19.1 [10.1] yā gā variṣṭhā sahasūr dharitrī vasuṃ vasuṃ vai vasunīha bhadrā
analyzed: yā gāḥ variṣṭhā sahasūḥ dharitrī vasum vasum vai vasunī iha bhadrā

original: 7.2.19.2 [10.2.] vāyur antarātmā vahatī samastas sa-puṇya deveti sa sūri-muktaḥ
analyzed: vāyuḥ antarātmā vahatī samastaḥ sa puṇya deva iti sa sūri muktaḥ

original: sūris surāṇāṃ suraso 'py asun-das samūhya devāya vara-dāya pitre svāhā
analyzed: sūriḥ surāṇām su rasaḥ pi asundaḥ devāya vara dāya pitre svāhā

original: 7.2.19.3 [10.3] sarvopariṣṭād adhi tiṣṭhat ātmā yasyopariṣṭāt paramas sa-muktaḥ
analyzed: sarva upariṣṭāt adhi tiṣṭhat ātmā yasya upariṣṭāt paramaḥ samuktaḥ

original: 7.2.19.4 [10.4] tamas sarva-bhūtam adhunod vareṇyas taṃ satva-rūpaṃ sakalaṃ prakāśya
analyzed: tamaḥ sarva bhūtam adhunot vareṇyaḥ tam sattva rūpam sakalam prakāśya

original: saṃkleśayant sṛṣṭi-nimittaye yas tasmai paraṃ-brahmaṇe paraṃ-jyotiṣe svāhā
analyzed: saṃkleśayan sṛṣṭi nimittaye yaḥ tasmai paraṃbrahmaṇe paraṃjyotiṣe svāhā

original: 7.2.19.5 [10.5] jyotir jyotiṣāṃ jyotir ojo balaṃ satvaṃ satvātmakaṃ saṃjyotir ittham tasmai sūkṣma-sūkṣmāya tejase svāhā
analyzed: jyotiḥ jyotiṣām jyotiḥ ojaḥ balam satvam sattva ātmakam saṃjyotiḥ ittham tasmai sūkṣma sūkṣmāya tejase svāhā

original: 7.2.20.1[*761] [10.6] satvaṃ satvātmakaṃ vā rajo rajasa ātmakam tamas tamasa ādhāras
analyzed: sattvam sattva ātmakam vā rajaḥ rajasaḥ ātmakam tamaḥ tamasaḥ ādhāraḥ

original: 7.2.20.2 [10.7] anirbhiṇṇaṃ yasyedam āsīd āsīd udakam ātmakam
analyzed: a nirbhiṇṇam yasya idam āsīt āsīt udakam ātmakam

original: yasyo dāvodan-artham[*762] uccam uccair urugāya svāhā
analyzed: yasya u uccam uccais urugāya svāhā

original: 7.2.20.3 [10.8] yasyecchā loke vā prajāyatir loke yan naivāsīt tan naivāsīt
analyzed: yasya icchā loke vā prajāyatiḥ loke yat na eva āsīt tat na eva āsīt

original: yad vā saṃjātaṃ yat sarvam īśam īśiṣe svāhā
analyzed: yat vā saṃjātam yat sarvam īśam īśiṣe svāhā

original: 7.2.20.4 [10.9][*763] yo vedādiḥ paramaḥ paro brahmā tri-mātras trayī-mūrtikaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ veda ādiḥ paramaḥ paraḥ brahmā tri mātraḥ trayī mūrtikaḥ
śabdaḥ śabda atigaḥ paraṃbrahmaṇe paraṃjyotiṣe svāhā

original: 7.2.20.5 [10.10][*764] yo vā 'vyaktaṃ sakalaṃ pravṛddhyai yad idaṃ sarvam āsīt
analyzed: yaḥ vā vyaktam sakalam pravṛddhyai yat idam sarvam āsīt

original: sānandaṃ sākṛtaṃ taṃ haran parāya svāhā
analyzed: sa ānandam sa akṛtam tam haran parāya svāhā

original: 7.2.21.1 [11.1][*765] yo vā bhūter bhūtir āsīt sā vānandaṃ pratyānandam
analyzed: yaḥ vā bhūteḥ bhūtiḥ āsīt sā vā ānandam pratyānandam

original: 7.2.21.2 [11.2] satyas satya-sthas satya-loka-sthas satyaṃ sañjanitram āsīt
analyzed: satyaḥ satya sthaḥ satya loka sthaḥ satyam san janitram āsīt

original: 7.2.21.3 [11.3] ṛta(g)ṃ satyaṃ amitaṃ purāṇam ādiṃ janitram amṛtaṃ surendram
analyzed: ṛtagm satyam amitam purāṇam ādim janitram amṛtam sura indram

original: 7.2.21.4 [11.4] aṃ rājimantaṃ sakalasya guptiṃ some juṣantam amṛtaṃ bibharti
analyzed: rājimantam sakalasya guptim some juṣantam amṛtam bibharti

original: rayimat supuṣṭiṃ guṇavantam atra tasmai supuṇyāya varadāya pitre svāhā
analyzed: rayimat su puṣṭim guṇavantam atra tasmai su puṇyāya vara dāya pitre svāhā

original: 7.2.21.5 [11.5] mām ātma-guptāṃ satvasya sarvasya vitāna-rūpāṃ saṃjūjuṣantīṃ paramāṃ pavitrām
analyzed: mām ātma guptām satvasya sarvasya vitāna rūpām saṃjūjuṣantīm paramām pavitrām

original: santārayantīṃ svayam apramattāṃ saṃyojayitre varadāya pitre svāhā
analyzed: santārayantīm svayam a pramattām saṃyojayitre vara dāya pitre svāhā

original: ṃ śatārdhāraṃ viṃśati pratyatarābhir aṣṭakaiṣ ṣaḍbhir viśva-rūpaika-pāśam
analyzed: ṃ śata ardha aram viṃśati pratyatarābhiḥ aṣṭakaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ viśvarūpa eka pāśam
tri mārga bhedam dvi nimitta eka moham

original: 8.1.1.2 prajā-patiṃ prathamaṃ yajñiyānāṃ devānām agre yajataṃ yajadhvam
analyzed: prajāpatim prathamam yajñiyānām devānām agre yajatam yajadhvam

original: ṃ rāyas poṣaṃ viṣyatu nābhim asme
analyzed: ṃ rāyaḥ poṣam viṣyatu nābhim asme

original: 8.1.1.3 raukmaṃ kūrmaṃ brahma-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: raukmam kūrmam brahmasthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.1.4 tam eka-nemim gajaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: tam eka nemim gajam pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: ṃ hiraṇmayam garuḍaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: ṃ hiraṇmayam garuḍam pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.1.6 brahmā devānām brahmaṇa imaṃ brahma-maṇiṃ brahma-sthāne 'ham pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: brahmā devānām brahmaṇaḥ imam brahma maṇim brahma sthāne ham pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.2.1 indraṃ praṇayantaṃ indrāyemaṃ vajra-maṇim indra-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: indram praṇayantam indrāya imam vajra maṇim indra sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.2.2 agnāv agniś carati praviṣṭa ṛṣīṇāṃ putro adhirāja eṣaḥ
analyzed: agnau agniḥ carati praviṣṭaḥ ṛṣīṇām putraḥ adhirājaḥ eṣaḥ

original: sāhākṛtya brahmaṇā te juhomi[*768] mā devānāṃ mithuyā kar bhāgadheyam
analyzed: sāhākṛtya brahmaṇā te mā devānām mithuyā kaḥ bhāgadheyam

original: 8.1.2.3 agnaya imaṃ mauktikam agni-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: agnaye imam mauktikam agni sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.2.4 yamo dādhāra yamāyemaṃ vaiḍūrya-maṇiṃ yama-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: yamaḥ dādhāra yamāya imam vaiḍūrya maṇim yama sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.2.5 vasavaḥ prathamaḥ nirṛtaya imaṃ śaṅkha-jaṃ nirṛti-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: vasavaḥ prathamaḥ nirṛtayaḥ imam śaṅkha jam nirṛti sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.3.1 ye te śatam varuṇāyemaṃ sphaṭika-maṇiṃ varuṇa-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: ye te śatam varuṇāya imam sphaṭika maṇim varuṇa sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.3.2 marutaḥ paramātmā vāyava imaṃ puṣya-kānta-maṇiṃ vāyu-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: marutaḥ paramātmā vāyavaḥ imam puṣya kānta maṇim vāyu sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.3.3 soma(g)ṃ rājānam somāyemaṃ candra-kānta-maṇiṃ soma-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: rājānam somāya imam candrakānta maṇim soma sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.3.4 īśānas sarva-lokānām īśānāyemaṃ nīla-maṇim īśāna-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: īśānaḥ sarva lokānām īśānāya imam nīla maṇim īśāna sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.3.5 śaṃ no nidhattām vāsukaya imam amṛtāśmaka-maṇiṃ vāsuki-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ nidhattām vāsukaye imam amṛta aśmaka maṇim vāsuki sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.4.1 dhātā dhātṛṇāṃ bhuvanasya yas patir deva(g)
analyzed: dhātā dhātṛṇām bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ deva g

original: imaṃ yajñam aśvinobhā bṛhaspatir devāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nyarthāt
analyzed: imam yajñam aśvinā ubhā bṛhaspatiḥ devāḥ pāntu yajamānam nyarthāt

original: 8.1.4.2 sādhyebhya imaṃ lohitāśmaka-maṇiṃ sādhya-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: sādhyebhyaḥ imam lohitāśmaka maṇim sādhya sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.4.3 viśve-devasya viśvebhyo devebhya imam utpala-maṇiṃ viśve-deva-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: viśvedevasya viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ imam utpala maṇim viśvedeva sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.4.4 adhi brahmā yatatām eṣa devo divas-patyāṃ vādhi maruto vobhayeṣām
analyzed: adhi brahmā yatatām eṣa devaḥ divaspatyām vā adhi marutaḥ vā ubhayeṣām

original: 8.1.4.5 tapo-yogī yoga ekas svādhiṣṭhā ninīhi viśvaṃ bhuvanasya bhūyaḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ yogī yogaḥ ekaḥ svādhiṣṭhāḥ ninīhi viśvam bhuvanasya bhūyas

original: 8.1.4.6 siddhebhya imaṃ pravāla[*770]-maṇiṃ siddha-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: siddhebhyaḥ imam siddhasthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.4.7 imāṃ mūrdhanyā mama vāṇy asūnāṃ pater indriyāṇāṃ mateḥ priyāṇām
analyzed: imām mūrdhanyā mama vāṇī asūnām pateḥ indriyāṇām mateḥ priyāṇām

original: vāco rucīnām[*771] pravarāya gāyan nidhiṃ nidadhyan prajayā astu bhūtyai
analyzed: vācaḥ pravarāya gāyan nidhim nidadhyan prajayā astu bhūtyai

original: 8.1.5.1 gandharvebhya imāṃ manaś-śilāṃ gandharva-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: gandharvebhyaḥ imām manaśśilām gandharva sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.5.2 apsarassu yo gandho gandharveṣu ca yad yaśaḥ
analyzed: apsarassu yaḥ gandhaḥ gandharveṣu ca yat yaśaḥ

original: daivo yo mānuṣo gandhas sa mā gandhas surabhir juṣatām
analyzed: daivaḥ yaḥ mānuṣaḥ gandhaḥ sa mā gandhaḥ surabhiḥ juṣatām

original: 8.1.5.3 apsarobhya imaṃ śukti-jam apsara-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: apsarobhyaḥ imam śuktijam apsarasthāne haṃ pratiṣṭāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.5.4 yaṅ kādraveyā[*772] adhigās samūhe śerate vīrās tasya paribarhi viśvam
analyzed: yaṅ adhigāḥ samūhe śerate vīrāḥ tasya paribarhi viśvam

original: taṃ vāsuke bhūta-sahasra-mūrte tubhyaṃ namaḥ prathaye bhūtaye tvā
analyzed: tam vāsuke bhūta sahasra mūrte tubhyam namaḥ prathaye bhūtaye tvā

original: 8.1.5.5 nāgebhya imaṃ vimala-maṇiṃ nāga-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: nāgebhyaḥ imam vimala maṇim nāga sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.5.6 aryamṇaḥ kumbhī śatruḥ pātra-pāṇir nipuṇaḥ aryamṇa imaṃ kurvindam aryama-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: aryamṇaḥ kumbhī śatruḥ pātrapāṇiḥ nipuṇaḥ aryamṇaḥ imam aryama sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.5.7 indraṃ praṇayantam indrāyemaṃ gairikam indra-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: indram praṇayantam indrāya imam gairikam indra sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.6.1 agnāv agniḥ agnaya imaṃ haritālakam[*773] agni-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: agnau agniḥ agnaye imam agni sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.6.2 yamo dādhāra yamāyemāṃ manaś-śilāṃ yama-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: yamaḥ dādhāra yamāya imām manaśśilām yama sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.6.3 vasavaḥ prathamaḥ nirṛtaya imam aṃjanaṃ nirṛti-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: vasavaḥ prathamaḥ nirṛtayaḥ imam añjanam nirṛti sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.6.4 ye te śataṃ varuṇāyemaṃ kāsīsaṃ varuṇa-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: ye te śatam varuṇāya imam kāsīsam varuṇa sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.6.5 marutaḥ paramātmā vāyava imaṃ pāradaṃ vāyu-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: marutaḥ paramātmā vāyavaḥ imam pāradam vāyu sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ
ṃ soma sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.7.2 īśānas sarva-lokānām īśānāyemaṃ go-rocanam īśāna-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: īśānaḥ sarva lokānām īśānāya imam gorocanam īśāna sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.7.3 brahmā devānāṃ padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣir viprāṇāṃ mahiṣo mṛgāṇām
analyzed: brahmā devānām padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣiḥ viprāṇām mahiṣaḥ mṛgāṇām

original: ṃ somaḥ pavitram aty eti rebhan[*775]
8.1.7.4 brahmaṇa imāni sarva-gandhāni brahma-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇe imāni sarva gandhāni brahma sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.7.5 indraṃ praṇayantam indrāyemāni[*776] ṣaṣtikān vrīhīnīndra-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: indram praṇayantam ṣaṣtikān vrīhīni indra sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.8.1 agnāv agniḥ agnaya imau kuluddha-māṣāv[*777] agni-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: agnau agniḥ agnaye imau agni sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.8.2 yamo dādhāra yamāyemau go-dhūma-mudgau yama-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: yamaḥ dādhāra yamāya imau godhūma mudgau yama sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.8.3 vasavaḥ prathamaḥ nirṛtaya imau tila-tilvau nirṛti-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: vasavaḥ prathamaḥ nirṛtayaḥ imau tila tilvau nirṛti sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.8.4 ye te śatam varuṇāyemau vaṃśa-yavau[*778] varuṇa-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: ye te śatam varuṇāya imau varuṇa sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.8.5 marutaḥ paramātmā vāyava imau nīvāra-priyāṃgū vāyu-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: marutaḥ paramātmā vāyavaḥ imau nīvāra priyāṃgū vāyu sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.9.1 soma(g)ṃ rājānam somāyemau godhūma-yavau soma-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: somagam rājānam somāya imau godhūma yavau soma sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.9.2 īśānas sarva-lokānām īśānayemāni sarva-bījānīśāna-sthāne 'haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: īśānaḥ sarva lokānām īśānayā imāni sarva bījāni īśāna sthāne haṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.9.3 bhūya ātma-vṛtyā bala-tejo-jananyā devopavāhyā manasā yayāsann
analyzed: bhūyas ātma vṛtyā bala tejaḥ jananyā deva upavāhyā manasā yayā āsan

original: 8.1.9.5 namas suloma sulomi bhuvi bhuvo cittala[*781] guhala[*782] doṇīyat
8.1.9.7 sa eko bhūd divāni śaṃ nas sañcāri bhavodbhavaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ekaḥ bhūt divāni śam naḥ sañcāri bhava udbhavaḥ

original: 8.1.10.2 devasya tvā ādarśaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: devasya tvā ādarśam pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.10.3 ato devā matsya-yugmaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: atas devāḥ matsya yugmam pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.10.4 kṣmām ekāṃ salilāvasannāṃ śrutvā svanantīm anu supatantīm
analyzed: kṣmām ekām salila avasannām śrutvā svanantīm anu su patantīm

original: svayam bhūtvā varāho vara ujjahāra tasmai devāya sukṛtāya pitre
analyzed: svayam bhūtvā varāhaḥ varaḥ ujjahāra tasmai devāya su kṛtāya pitre

original: 8.1.10.6 tan mā yaśo 'gre śaṅkaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: tat mā yaśaḥ gre śaṅkam pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.11.1 brahmā devānām āvartaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy om namaḥ
analyzed: brahmā devānām āvartam pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.11.2 bhūmān anto 'gre gadā-cakrāsi-śarān pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: bhūmān antaḥ gre gadā cakra asi śarān pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.11.3 tan mā yaśo 'gre śaṅkha-śārṅga-kheṭakān pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: tat mā yaśaḥ gre śaṅkha śārṅga kheṭakān pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.11.4 brahma[*783] brahmāntarātmā brahma-pūtāntarātmā brahmaṇi brahma-niṣṭho brahma-gupto gupto 'ham asmi
analyzed: brahma antarātmā brahma pūta antarātmā brahmaṇi brahma niṣṭhaḥ brahma guptaḥ guptaḥ ham asmi
sruva kamaṇḍalu tulā toda yuga lāṅgala ādi varṇa cihnāni pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.12.1 ye te śatam megha-vidyul-lāṃchanaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: ye te śatam megha vidyut lāṃchanam pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.12.2 śriye jātaḥ śrī-rūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: śriye jātaḥ śrī rūpam pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.12.3 medinī devī hariṇī-rūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namaḥ
analyzed: medinī devī hariṇī rūpam pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ

original: 8.1.12.7 viṣṇor nu kam ā tvāhārṣam ekākṣara(g)
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ nu kam ā tvā ahārṣam eka akṣara g

original: 8.1.13.1 viṣṇor nu kam ato devā idaṃ viṣṇus trīṇi padā viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ tad viprāsaḥ
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ nu kam atas devāḥ idam viṣṇuḥ trīṇi padā viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi tat viṣṇoḥ paramam tat viprāsaḥ

original: 8.0.1 brahma devānāṃ namaḥ pratiṣṭhapayāmy oṃ namo 'stu bhūtyai praṇayantaṃ marutaḥ
analyzed: brahma devānām namaḥ pratiṣṭhapayāmi om namaḥ stu bhūtyai praṇayantam marutaḥ

original: paramātmā pratiṣṭhāpayāmy oṃ namo namas sañcāri bhavodbhavas tan mā yaśo 'gre namaḥ
analyzed: paramātmā pratiṣṭhāpayāmi om namaḥ namaḥ sañcāri bhavodbhavaḥ tat mā yaśaḥ gre namaḥ

original: 8.1.14.1 ud vayaṃ tamasa ud u tyaṃ jāta-vedaśam
analyzed: ud vayam tamasaḥ ud u tyam jātavedaśam
hiraṇya pāṇim ūtaye savitāram upa hvaye

original: [*816] The texts inserts the word ya here which we have omitted.
analyzed: the texts inserts the word ya here which we have omitted

original: 8.0.4 sa(gg)ṃśrayāya namo bhūs sva-guṇair jyotir āsīd deva-rīṣata utpādayāmi pratiṣṭhāpayāmi
analyzed: saggṃśrayāya namaḥ bhūḥ sva guṇaiḥ jyotiḥ āsīt utpādayāmi pratiṣṭhāpayāmi

original: pracodayāt svāhā namaḥ pracodayān namo namo devāya namaś śrī kṛṣṇāya namas svāhā
analyzed: pracodayāt svāhā namaḥ pracodayāt namaḥ namaḥ devāya namaḥ śrī kṛṣṇāya namaḥ svāhā

original: phaṭ[*817] sarva-pāpair anumanyatām āvāhayāmi namaṣ ṣaṭ ca
analyzed: sarva pāpaiḥ anumanyatām āvāhayāmi namaḥ ṣaṣ ca

original: 8.1.64.2 astv āsanaṃ śubhaṃ loke brusī śuddhas tapo-mayam
analyzed: astu āsanam śubham loke brusī śuddhaḥ tapaḥ mayam

original: 8.1.64.3 tapaś cāyus tathā yogam astu te paramaṃ padam
analyzed: tapaḥ ca āyuḥ tathā yogam astu te paramam padam
viśva ādikānām janana ādi kartre dhātre tapaḥ yajña su veda mūrte

original: 8.1.64.5 susvāgataṃ yatra taṃ tatra yasmāt tat te pada(g)
analyzed: su svāgatam yatra tam tatra yasmāt tat te padak

original: 8.1.64.6 mano 'bhimantā mānavas sudharmā yan mātaraṃ vacaso mānaseṣu
analyzed: manaḥ bhimantā mānavaḥ su dharmā yat mātaram vacasaḥ mānaseṣu

original: amogham oghaṃ prati veda-vedya-svakaṃ janānām anumanyatām idam
analyzed: amogham ogham prati veda vedya svakam janānām anumanyatām idam

original: 8.1.64.7 tva(gg)ṃ strī tvaṃ pumān mānasī[*819] tvaṃ deva-kumāra idaṃ nādaḥ kumārī

original: 8.1.64.8 tvaṃ jīrṇas tvaṃ janiṃ gacchasi tvaṃ jāto nivāsīr viśvato mukhaḥ

original: 8.1.65.1 indro 'bhimantā manavo vāyavaś cāpas samagrā abhito yasya dadyāt
analyzed: indraḥ bhimantā manavaḥ vāyavaḥ ca apaḥ samagrāḥ abhitas yasya dadyāt

original: 8.1.65.3 agnir indro varuṇo mitro aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatī sa-joṣasaḥ

original: 8.1.65.6 indriyāṇi śata-krato yā te janeṣu pañcasu

original: 8.1.65.7 agann indra śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ dadhiṣva duṣṭaraṃ

original: 8.1.65.9 ghatāt pari maṇḍa ivāpsu snehas sarvādhikas sarva-dhatteṣu śarvaḥ

original: 8.0.5 trīṇi padā śaṃ no devīś catvāri ca

original: 8.1.66.2 vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam āditya-varṇaṃ tamasas tu pāre

original: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīraḥ nāmāni kṛtvābhivadan yadāste

original: 8.1.66.4 ā mā vājasya prasavo jagamyād ā dyāvā-pṛthivī viśva-śambhū

original: ā mā gantāṃ pitarā mātarā cā mā somo amṛtatvāya gamyāt

original: 8.1.67.3 pra tad viṣṇus trīṇi padā śaṃ no devīḥ

original: 8.1.67.5 tena me tapa tena me jvala tena me dīdihi yāvad devāḥ
analyzed: tena me tapa tena me jvala tena me dīdihi yāvat devāḥ
yoge yoge tavastaram vāje vāje havāmahe

original: 8.1.67.8 yan me garbhe vasataḥ pāpam ugraṃ yaj jāyamānasya ca kiñca dairghyam
analyzed: yat me garbhe vasataḥ pāpam ugram yat jāyamānasya ca kiñca dairghyam

original: pāpaṃ jātasya yasya bhuvi vartato me tasya tat pāvamānībhir ahaṃ punāmi
analyzed: pāpam jātasya yasya bhuvi vartataḥ me tasya tat pāvamānībhiḥ aham punāmi

original: 8.1.68.2 ato devāḥ idaṃ viṣṇus trīṇi padā viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ tad viprāsaḥ
analyzed: atas devāḥ idam viṣṇuḥ trīṇi padā viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi tat viṣṇoḥ paramam tat viprāsaḥ

original: 8.1.68.6 parilikhitas so 'stu yo 'smān dveṣṭi yañ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ
analyzed: parilikhitaḥ saḥ stu yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ
namaḥ varuṇaḥ śuddhaḥ śuddhaḥ ham asmi

analyzed: śuddhaḥ brahma vīraḥ hariḥ yathā śuddhaḥ pañcabhūtāḥ tathā śuddhāḥ śuddhaḥ ham asmi

original: juṣasva havyam āhutaṃ prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ
analyzed: juṣasva havyam āhutam prajām devi didiḍḍhi naḥ

original: 8.1.69.4 bhūr anilayā bhūtayā bhūtayā pariṣiñcāmi bhuvas suṣumnayā prāṇavatyā pariṣiñcāmi svar amṛtavatyā jyotiṣmatyā ca pariṣiñcāmi
analyzed: bhūḥ anilayā bhūtayā bhūtayā pariṣiñcāmi bhuvaḥ suṣumnayā prāṇavatyā pariṣiñcāmi svar amṛtavatyā jyotiṣmatyā ca pariṣiñcāmi

original: 8.1.69.5 tā(g)ṃ savitur vareṇyasya citrām ahaṃ[*821] vṛṇe sumatiṃ viśva-janyām yām asya kaṇvo aduhat prapīnā(g)
analyzed: tāgm savituḥ vareṇyasya citrām vṛṇe sumatim viśvajanyām yām asya kaṇvaḥ aduhat prapīnāk
ṃ sahasra dhārām payasā mahīm gām

analyzed: ṃ sa rājā rājyam anumanyatām idam

pūtāḥ brahma pavitreṇa pūtāḥ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ

original: 8.1.72.10 tena vāmāñje tejase varcase bhagāya ca
analyzed: tena vāmāñje tejase varcase bhagāya ca

original: 8.1.73.1 devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām

analyzed: ghṛtāt pari maṇḍaḥ iva apsu snehaḥ sarva adhikaḥ sarva dhatteṣu śarvaḥ

original: [*826] 1946, 1984 editions: atyo corrected to ato. cf. VMP 8.1.19.3
8.0.7 sukratuṃ bhagāya ca puṇyāya namo nāra-siṃhāya namaḥ kuberāya namas sukhāvahāya namas sanaṃdanaṃ prapadye devānāṃ vārāham āvāhayāmi nārāyaṇāya  #
analyzed: sukratum bhagāya ca puṇyāya namaḥ nārasiṃhāya namaḥ kuberāya namaḥ sukha āvahāya namaḥ sanaṃdanam prapadye devānām vārāham āvāhayāmi nārāyaṇāya

original: 8.1.82.1 agnim īḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam
analyzed: agnim īḍe purohitam yajñasya devam ṛtvijam

original: 8.1.82.5 ā mā vājasya citraṃ devānām ādityam āvāhayāmi
analyzed: ā mā vājasya citram devānām ādityam āvāhayāmi

original: 8.1.83.9 yat te susīme hṛdayaṃ divi candramasi śritam
analyzed: yat te su sīme hṛdayam divi candramasi śritam

original: 8.1.84.1 veda te bhūmi hṛdayaṃ divi candramasi śritam
analyzed: veda te bhūmi hṛdayam divi candramasi śritam

original: 8.1.84.6 tad asya priyam abhi pātho aśyāṃ naro yatra devayavo madanti
analyzed: tat asya priyam abhi pāthaḥ aśyām naraḥ yatra devayavaḥ madanti

original: urukramasya sa hi bandhur itthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhva uthsaḥ
analyzed: urukramasya sa hi bandhuḥ itthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhvaḥ uthsaḥ

original: 8.1.84.7 subhūs svayam-bhūḥ prathamaṃ[*828] mahaty arṇave dadhe ha garbham ṛtviyam yato jātaḥ prajā-patiḥ
analyzed: subhūḥ svayambhūḥ mahati arṇave dadhe ha garbham ṛtviyam yatas jātaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: 8.1.85.3 idaṃ viṣṇur vicakrame yoge-yoge trir devaḥ
analyzed: idam viṣṇuḥ vicakrame yoge yoge tris devaḥ

original: 8.1.85.5 samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagno inīśatayā śocati muhyamānaḥ

original: juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyaty anyam īśaṃ tadābhīmānam eti[*831] vīta-śokaḥ
analyzed: juṣṭam yadā paśyati anyam īśam tadā abhīmānam vīta śokaḥ

original: 8.1.85.6 yoge-yoge śan no devīr vicakrame pṛthivī
analyzed: yoge yoge śat naḥ devīḥ vicakrame pṛthivī

original: [*829] TS: taṃ juṣasva replaces tvaṃ juṣaja

ts gave śvāya puruṣāya replaces vaiśvānarāya

original: [*831] ŚvetU, MuṇḍU: asya mahimānam iti replaces tadābhīmānam eti
analyzed: śvetu muṇḍu asya mahimānam iti replaceḥ tadā abhīmānam eti

original: 8.1.86.2 bhūḥ prapadye ato devā sahasra-śīrṣā puruṣas sahasra-śīrṣaṃ devam ekākṣaraṃ śubhrā jyotiḥ
analyzed: bhūḥ prapadye atas devā sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasra śīrṣam devam eka akṣaram śubhrā jyotiḥ

original: 8.1.86.3 upāvaroha jātavedaḥ punas tvaṃ devebhyo havyaṃ vaha naḥ prajānan

original: ṃ rayim asmāsu dhehy ajasro dīdihi no duroṇe
analyzed: ṃ rayim asmāsu dhehi ajasraḥ dīdihi naḥ duroṇe

original: 8.1.86.5 catvāri śṛṅgā trayo asya pādā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya

original: trīdhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyā(g)ṃ ā viveśa

original: 8.1.87.3 ato devā idaṃ viṣṇus trīṇi padā viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ tad viprāsaḥ
analyzed: atas devāḥ idam viṣṇuḥ trīṇi padā viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi tat viṣṇoḥ paramam tat viprāsaḥ

original: 8.1.87.6 agnim īḷa iṣe tvorje tvāgna ā yāhi śaṃ no devīḥ

original: 8.1.89.1 rathantaram asi vāmadevyam asi bṛhad asi
analyzed: rathantaram asi vāmadevyam asi bṛhat asi

original: 8.1.89.2 aṅkau nyaṅkāv abhito rathaṃ yau dhvāntaṃ vātāgram anu sañcarantau

original: ariṣṭa svasti gacchatu vivighnan pṛtanā yataḥ

original: 8.1.89.4 iha dhṛtir iha vidhṛtir iha rantir iha ramatiḥ

original: 8.1.90.2 ato devā udyantaṃ vāvādityaṃ devasya tvā viṣṇus tvā(g)ṃ rakṣatu

analyzed: ā amūḥ aja pratyāvartaya imāḥ ketumat duṃdhubhiḥ vāvadīti

original: sam aśva-parṇāś caranti no naro 'smākam indra rathino jayantu
analyzed: sam aśva parṇāḥ caranti naḥ naraḥ smākam indra rathinaḥ jayantu

original: 8.1.140.6 indrāya vācaṃ vadatendraṃ vājaṃ jāpayatendro vājam ajayit

original: [*854] RV: duchunā; TS: ducchunāṃ. Proof that Vaikhānasas follow TS.
analyzed: ru ducchunā ts ducchunām proof that vaikhānasas follow ts

original: yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema
analyzed: yasya chāyā amṛtam yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema
yasya ime himavantaḥ mahitvā yasya samudra g

original: yasyemāḥ pradiśo yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: 8.1.142.5 yaṃ krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhy aikṣetāṃ manasā rejamāne

original: 8.1.142.6 yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhe[*856] yena suvas stabhitaṃ yena nākaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ antarikṣe rajasaḥ vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

analyzed: indram vaḥ viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ

original: 8.1.143.3 indriyāṇi śata-krato yā te janeṣu pañcasu

original: ṃ haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ
analyzed: ṃ haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ

original: [*863] VMP divides this verse making the second line the first line of chapter 144. The numbering is adjusted so that the complete verse comes  #
analyzed: divides this verse making the second line the first line of chapter  the numbering is adjusted so that the complete verse comes

original: [*865] VMP divides this verse making the second line the first line of chapter 145. The numbering is adjusted so that the complete verse comes  #
analyzed: divides this verse making the second line the first line of chapter  the numbering is adjusted so that the complete verse comes

original: 8.1.145.1 sam indra ṇo manasā neṣi gobhiḥ sa(g)

analyzed: vaivasvate vivicyante yame rājani te janāḥ

analyzed: ye ca iha satyena icchante ye u ca anṛta vādinaḥ

original: atrā no viś-patiḥ pitā purāṇā[*878] anu venati

original: [*880] cf. VMP 6.19.1: stenaḥ instead of te naḥ

original: idaṃ te tad vi ṣyāmy āyuṣo na madhyād athā jīvaḥ pitum addhi pramuktaḥ

analyzed: bhūmiḥ iti tvā janāḥ viduḥ nirṛtiḥ iti tvā aham pari veda viśvatas
a sunvantam a yajamānam iccha stenasya ityām taskarasya anveṣi

original: anyam asmad iccha sā ta ityā namo devi nirṛte tubhyam astu
analyzed: anyam asmat iccha sā te ityā namaḥ devi nirṛte tubhyam astu

analyzed: namaḥ te nirṛtaye ghana tejāya tasmai visṛja bandhanāt

ṃ saḥ sya prajām paśūn pāhi

original: 8.1.152.12 sahasrākṣo vā ayam agniḥ pitaro devatānām

original: prajāyai paśūnāṃ bhūyād upastaraṇam ahaṃ prajāyai paśūnāṃ bhūyāsaṃ prāṇāpānau mṛtyor
analyzed: prajāyai paśūnām bhūyāt upastaraṇam aham prajāyai paśūnām bhūyāsam prāṇa apānau mṛtyoḥ

original: 8.1.201.1 śaṃ no mitraś śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā

original: śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no viṣṇur urukramaḥ

original: 8.1.202.3 śam uṣā no vyucchatu śam āditya udetu naḥ

original: 8.1.202.4 śivā naś śantamā bhava sumṛḍīkā sarasvatī

analyzed: iḍāyai vāstu asi vāstumat vāstumantaḥ bhūyāsma mā vāstoḥ cith sma hi a vāstuḥ sa bhuyāt yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ

original: 8.1.202.6 pratiṣṭhāsi pratiṣṭhāvanto bhūyāsma mā pratiṣṭhāyāś cith sma hy apratiṣṭhas sa bhūyād yo 'smān dveṣṭi yañ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ
